mapper.insert: insert into TSU0505 (ST_DATE, REQUIREMENT_ID, INTERFACE_ID, STATUS, CHANNEL_ID, SYSTEM_ID, RESOURCE_TYPE) select #{stDate} ,a.REQUIREMENT_ID ,b.INTERFACE_ID ,a.STATUS ,b.CHANNEL_ID ,c.SYSTEM_ID ,c.RESOURCE_TYPE from TAN0101 a INNER JOIN TAN0201 b on a.INTERFACE_ID = b.INTERFACE_ID and a.DEL_YN = 'N' and b.DEL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TAN0213 c on b.INTERFACE_ID = c.INTERFACE_ID and c.NODE_TYPE = '2' and c.SEQ = (select min(SEQ) from TAN0213 where INTERFACE_ID = c.INTERFACE_ID and NODE_TYPE = '2') group by a.REQUIREMENT_ID ,b.INTERFACE_ID ,b.CHANNEL_ID ,c.SYSTEM_ID ,c.RESOURCE_TYPE ,a.STATUS order by a.REQUIREMENT_ID ,b.INTERFACE_ID ,b.CHANNEL_ID ,c.SYSTEM_ID ,c.RESOURCE_TYPE ,a.STATUS
